20110102050029.000|20110102050035.000|CC1|MYSTERIES.

20110102050043.000|20110102050043.000|CC1|I KNEW WHAT HAPPENED TO ERIC    
20110102050043.000|20110102050050.000|CC1|MILLER.                         
20110102050050.000|20110102050051.000|CC1|ERIC CAME HOME THAT NIGHT       
20110102050051.000|20110102050056.000|CC1|EXTREMELY ILL.                  
20110102050056.000|20110102050101.000|CC1|HE KEEPS GETTING WORSE AND WORSE
20110102050101.000|20110102050102.000|CC1|AS THE NIGHT WEARS ON.          
20110102050102.000|20110102050103.000|CC1|HE REALIZED THAT HE HAD TO GO TO
20110102050103.000|20110102050106.000|CC1|THE HOSPITAL.                   
20110102050106.000|20110102050108.000|CC1|I MEAN, THE FIRST THING THAT    
20110102050108.000|20110102050110.000|CC1|CROSSED MY MIND... I MEAN, THIS 
20110102050110.000|20110102050111.000|CC1|GUY'S A SCIENTIST.              
20110102050111.000|20110102050113.000|CC1|HE WAS A PEDIATRIC AIDS         
20110102050113.000|20110102050116.000|CC1|RESEARCHER.                     
20110102050116.000|20110102050118.000|CC1|HE WORKED IN A LABORATORY.      
20110102050118.000|20110102050119.000|CC1|WHAT ARE IN LABORATORIES?       
20110102050119.000|20110102050124.000|CC1|A LOT OF DANGEROUS THINGS.      
20110102050124.000|20110102050127.000|CC1|>> ERIC WAS VERY AGITATED.      
20110102050127.000|20110102050128.000|CC1|THEY HAD TO PUT HIM IN          
20110102050128.000|20110102050131.000|CC1|RESTRAINTS.                     
20110102050131.000|20110102050133.000|CC1|WATCHING MY BROTHER THAT WAY,   
20110102050133.000|20110102050137.000|CC1|OUT OF CONTROL, IT WAS HORRIBLE.
20110102050137.000|20110102050138.000|CC1|IT WAS THE WORST NIGHT THAT I   
20110102050138.000|20110102050142.000|CC1|CAN REMEMBER OF MY LIFE.        
20110102050142.000|20110102050143.000|CC1|>> TEST RESULTS CAME BACK, AND  
20110102050143.000|20110102050145.000|CC1|THEY SHOWED ERIC HAD RECEIVED   
20110102050145.000|20110102050146.000|CC1|VERY HIGH DOSES OF A VERY LETHAL
20110102050146.000|20110102050153.000|CC1|TOXIN.                          
20110102050153.000|20110102050153.000|CC1|WAS SOMEONE TRYING TO KILL ERIC 
20110102050153.000|20110102050157.000|CC1|MILLER?                         
20110102050157.000|20110102050159.000|CC1|>> AND I COULDN'T BELIEVE IT.   
20110102050159.000|20110102050200.000|CC1|I THOUGHT, HOW COULD THIS       
20110102050200.000|20110102050206.000|CC1|HAPPEN?                         
20110102050206.000|20110102050208.000|CC1|>> OFFICER FORD WAS SENT TO REX 
20110102050208.000|20110102050210.000|CC1|HOSPITAL TO SPEAK WITH ERIC     
20110102050210.000|20110102050212.000|CC1|MILLER.

20110102050213.000|20110102050215.000|CC1|HE WAS LAYING IN THE BED.

20110102050217.000|20110102050218.000|CC1|HE WAS IN OBVIOUS, OBVIOUS SIGNS
20110102050218.000|20110102050220.000|CC1|OF PAIN.

20110102050606.000|20110102050607.000|CC1|HAPPENED THAT EVENING MADE ANY

20110102050612.000|20110102050615.000|CC1|ON THE MEND, RECOVERING.        
20110102050615.000|20110102050615.000|CC1|>> THEY WERE GOING TO TAKE CARE 
20110102050615.000|20110102050617.000|CC1|OF ERIC.

20110102050619.000|20110102050620.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SIX MONTHS EARLIER,
20110102050620.000|20110102050621.000|CC1|THEIR 30-YEAR-OLD SON, A        
20110102050621.000|20110102050627.000|CC1|RESPECTED YOUNG SCIENTIST, WAS  
20110102050627.000|20110102050630.000|CC1|THE PERFECT SPECIMEN OF HEALTH. 
20110102050630.000|20110102050631.000|CC1|HE'S ALWAYS BEEN THAT WAY.

20110102050633.000|20110102050636.000|CC1|ERIC WAS THE PICTURE IMAGE OF   
20110102050636.000|20110102050640.000|CC1|THE ALL-AMERICAN BOY.

20110102050732.000|20110102050733.000|CC1|HER LIFE.

20110102050740.000|20110102050742.000|CC1|IN RALEIGH, NORTH CAROLINA.     
20110102050742.000|20110102050745.000|CC1|ERIC GOT A PRESTIGIOUS POSITION 
20110102050745.000|20110102050747.000|CC1|AS A PEDIATRIC AIDS RESEARCHER, 
20110102050747.000|20110102050749.000|CC1|AND ANN WAS A CHEMIST AT A LARGE
20110102050749.000|20110102050755.000|CC1|PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY.         
20110102050755.000|20110102050756.000|CC1|WHEN THEIR DAUGHTER, CLARE, WAS 
20110102050756.000|20110102050759.000|CC1|BORN, ERIC WAS OVER THE MOON.   
20110102050759.000|20110102050800.000|CC1|>> HE LOOKS AT ME AND HE SAYS,  
20110102050800.000|20110102050801.000|CC1|"MOM, YOU ALWAYS TOLD ME HOW    
20110102050801.000|20110102050803.000|CC1|MUCH YOU LOVE ME."

20110102050805.000|20110102050806.000|CC1|MUCH YOU LOVED ME UNTIL I HAD

20110102050844.000|20110102050846.000|CC1|ANSWER.

20110102050852.000|20110102050853.000|CC1|OUT BOWLING AND WAS VIOLENTLY

20110102050902.000|20110102050903.000|CC1|WHEN HE GOT BETTER, THEY        
20110102050903.000|20110102050905.000|CC1|RELEASED HIM, BUT JUST WEEKS    
20110102050905.000|20110102050906.000|CC1|LATER, ERIC WAS DEATHLY ILL     
20110102050906.000|20110102050909.000|CC1|AGAIN.                          
20110102050909.000|20110102050911.000|CC1|TO EVERYONE'S SHOCK, BLOOD TESTS
20110102050911.000|20110102050912.000|CC1|REVEALED ERIC HAD BEEN POISONED 
20110102050912.000|20110102050915.000|CC1|WITH ARSENIC.                   
20110102050915.000|20110102050915.000|CC1|>> HOW DO YOU GET ARSENIC       
20110102050915.000|20110102050918.000|CC1|POISONING?                      
20110102050918.000|20110102050919.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HOURS LATER, ERIC  
20110102050919.000|20110102050922.000|CC1|MILLER WAS DEAD.                
20110102050922.000|20110102050922.000|CC1|THE POLICE IMMEDIATELY LAUNCHED 
20110102050922.000|20110102050925.000|CC1|AN INVESTIGATION.               
20110102050925.000|20110102050926.000|CC1|>> WE NEED TO GET SAMPLES OF    
20110102050926.000|20110102050928.000|CC1|EVERYTHING IN THE HOUSE TO FIND 
20110102050928.000|20110102050931.000|CC1|OUT WHERE THE ARSENIC CAME FROM.
20110102050931.000|20110102050932.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DETECTIVE DEBORAH  
20110102050932.000|20110102050933.000|CC1|REGENTIN WAS SENT TO SEARCH THE 
20110102050933.000|20110102050938.000|CC1|MILLER HOME.                    
20110102050938.000|20110102050942.000|CC1|>> EVERY SHAMPOO, CONDITIONER,  
20110102050942.000|20110102050945.000|CC1|SOAP, ANY FLUID, EVERYTHING OUT 
20110102050945.000|20110102050946.000|CC1|OF THE REFRIGERATOR, A SAMPLE   
20110102050946.000|20110102050949.000|CC1|WAS TAKEN.                      
20110102050949.000|20110102050950.000|CC1|>> Reporter: POLICE SCOURED     
20110102050950.000|20110102050952.000|CC1|ERIC'S PLACE OF WORK FOR CLUES. 
20110102050952.000|20110102050954.000|CC1|>> ONE OF MY FIRST THOUGHTS WAS 
20110102050954.000|20110102050955.000|CC1|HE'S WORKING IN A LAB.          
20110102050955.000|20110102050956.000|CC1|>> Reporter: LIEUTENANT CHRIS   
20110102050956.000|20110102050957.000|CC1|MORGAN:                         
20110102050957.000|20110102050958.000|CC1|>> MAYBE SOMETHING WAS DRIPPING 
20110102050958.000|20110102050959.000|CC1|DOWN.                           
20110102050959.000|20110102051000.000|CC1|MAYBE, YOU KNOW, HE HAD A ROAST 
20110102051000.000|20110102051003.000|CC1|BEEF SANDWICH THAT SOMEHOW GOT  
20110102051003.000|20110102051006.000|CC1|EXPOSED TO ARSENIC BY MISTAKE.  
20110102051006.000|20110102051008.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THIS WAS NOT A 
20110102051008.000|20110102051009.000|CC1|MISTAKE.                        
20110102051009.000|20110102051012.000|CC1|MEDICAL EXAMINER TOM CLARK:     
20110102051012.000|20110102051014.000|CC1|>> THE LEVELS IN ERIC MILLER    
20110102051014.000|20110102051015.000|CC1|WERE HIGH ENOUGH THAT ACCIDENTAL
20110102051015.000|20110102051018.000|CC1|EXPOSURE IS NOT A POSSIBILITY.

20110102053749.000|20110102053749.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20110102053749.000|20110102053751.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20110102053751.000|20110102053753.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20110102053753.000|20110102053753.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20110102053753.000|20110102053756.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20110102053756.000|20110102053756.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20110102053756.000|20110102053758.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20110102053758.000|20110102053800.000|CC1|       have been reported.

20110102053800.000|20110102053802.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20110102053802.000|20110102053804.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.

20110102053804.000|20110102053806.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20110102053806.000|20110102053806.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20110102053806.000|20110102053808.000|CC1|           may occur.

20110102053810.000|20110102053813.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20110102053813.000|20110102053815.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal.

20110102053817.000|20110102053817.000|CC1|            dizziness

20110102054414.000|20110102054415.000|CC1|>> GETTING RID OF EVIDENCE.     
20110102054415.000|20110102054417.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND THAT'S NOT THE 
20110102054417.000|20110102054419.000|CC1|ONLY EVIDENCE SHE DESTROYED.    
20110102054419.000|20110102054422.000|CC1|AFTER ERIC'S DEATH, ANN INSISTED
20110102054422.000|20110102054424.000|CC1|HER HUSBAND BE CREMATED AGAINST 
20110102054424.000|20110102054425.000|CC1|HIS FAMILY'S WISHES.            
20110102054425.000|20110102054426.000|CC1|YOU DID NOT WANT YOUR SON       
20110102054426.000|20110102054428.000|CC1|CREMATED.                       
20110102054428.000|20110102054431.000|CC1|>> WE DID NOT WANT HIM CREMATED.
20110102054431.000|20110102054432.000|CC1|WE JUST... WE DIDN'T WANT IT.   
20110102054432.000|20110102054433.000|CC1|IT WAS LIKE HE DIED AND THEN    
20110102054433.000|20110102054434.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO DESTROY HIM      
20110102054434.000|20110102054439.000|CC1|AGAIN.                          
20110102054439.000|20110102054440.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT ANN BEGGED FOR 
20110102054440.000|20110102054443.000|CC1|ERIC'S ASHES TO BE INTERRED AT  
20110102054443.000|20110102054444.000|CC1|THE CATHOLIC CHURCH IN RALEIGH  
20110102054444.000|20110102054445.000|CC1|SO SHE AND CLARE WOULD BE ABLE  
20110102054445.000|20110102054447.000|CC1|TO VISIT EVERY SUNDAY.          
20110102054447.000|20110102054448.000|CC1|>> SHE JUST KNEW HOW TO PLAY    
20110102054448.000|20110102054450.000|CC1|YOUR HEARTSTRINGS.              
20110102054450.000|20110102054452.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JUST WEEKS LATER,

20110102054454.000|20110102054454.000|CC1|RALEIGH AND LEAVE ERIC'S ASHES

20110102055448.000|20110102055450.000|CC1|SO, IN 2005, FIVE YEARS AFTER   
20110102055450.000|20110102055454.000|CC1|THEIR SON'S MURDER, THE MILLERS 
20110102055454.000|20110102055455.000|CC1|FINALLY HEAR THEIR DAUGHTER-IN- 
20110102055455.000|20110102055459.000|CC1|LAW ACCEPT GUILT.
